'''''wing''''' means "foam, spume, spindrift" in the tongue of the [[Green-elves]] of [[Ossiriand]], as interpreted by the [[Lambengolmor|Elven loremasters]] after the destruction of [[Beleriand]].<ref name=PMXI4>{{PM|XI4}}, pp. 349, 365 (note 55)</ref>

Another conception is that ''wing'' was a [[Taliska|Bëorian]] word.<ref name=PMRos>{{PM|Ros}}, pp. 369-70</ref>

== Examples ==
* [[Elwing]]<ref name=PMXI4/><ref name=PMRos/>
* [[Vingilótë|Vingilótë]],<ref name=PMXI4/>
* [[Vingilótë|Wingalótë]]<ref name=PMRos/>

== See also ==
* [[Sindarin]] ''[[gwing]]''
